divs: Sighting Detailsat about 10pm est, a starlike object dropped from the sky, then slowed to almost a stop and proceeded to move at a slow pace moving due east. the object appeared from the north assuming over Lake Erie. About 10 min later another starlike object was travling from west to east. it then stopped...matching the stars in the sky, then started moving due north, then faded into nothing.
Object Flight Path: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
